name: Delivery (clearVariable)
description:
In the Void, plenty of people live in their own little pocket dimensions. When they order something or someone sends them something in the mail, it can usually just be teleported right to their door. Sometimes that isn't possible and it needs to be delivered by hand. In this game, you control one of these by-hand delivery people during a run-of-the-mill day at work.

Made this for 80K Foundations of Game Design class at UCSC.
